articles.title: 'Unlike any planets found in our solar system:' These two planets are probably made of water, study finds - CNN
articles.description: Two far-off planets are likely made of water, according to research conducted using NASA's Hubble and Spitzer telescopes.
articles.content:
Two far-off planets are likely made of water, according to research conducted using NASAs Hubble and Spitzer telescopes.

articles.title: As public anger mounts, Peru's lawmakers reject reform needed to hold early elections - CNN
articles.description: As Peru explodes in protest with supporters of its former president taking to streets, lawmakers on Friday rejected a constitutional reform that is needed to hold early general elections in 2023.

articles.title: Highland Park suspected shooter's father is charged with felony reckless conduct - CNN

articles.title: CDC investigating apparent rise in strep A infections in children - CNN
articles.description: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says it's investigating an apparent increase in invasive group A strep infections, but the rise may indicate a return to typical pre-pandemic levels.
